scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node -r dotenv-safe/config node_modules/next/dist/bin/next dev --turbopack
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node -r dotenv-safe/config node_modules/next/dist/bin/next build
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node -r dotenv-safe/config node_modules/next/dist/bin/next start
